name: Maze Roller (itch) (tschlovieck)
description:
Game made as submission for GMTK 2022 

Made in pygame - https://www.pygame.org/

Sound effect is sfxr - https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Compiled with PyInstaller - https://pyinstaller.org/

Enjoy :)

Game Walkthrough

Spoilers - level solutions

Level 1 Did you even try? Level 2 You can't go straight to the goal, as you would have 1 on the front side. You need to go down, left and up. Level 3 First you have to do one counter-clockwise or two clockwise loops. That way, 2 is on the side facing down, so it stays as you roll sideways. Once you go up, it rools onto front face.
Written step by step: right, up, left, down, right as long as you can and finally up. Level 4 There are many different ways, how to beat this one. Probably simplest are down, 3*left, up or up, 3*left, down Level 5 right, 2*up, left, down, right, up, 2*right, down, right
